Quest For The Golden Chalice

by Team Pixelboy

Released Jan 1, 2012
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

The townspeople - including the royal guards - have all fled the kingdom, leaving the Prince alone to fend for himself, and even worse, Mardok has stolen the Golden Chalice, the greatest treasure of Larosia! It now falls to the Prince to restore the people's confidence in his royalty, and there's only one way to do it: He must return the Golden Chalice to the Yellow Castle!
